articles.title: What is a powder shampoo and how can it help you be more sustainable? - Channel NewsAsia

articles.content:
WHY SWITCH TO POWDER?
Tans product is not the first powder shampoo. Over the past couple of years, a handful of cult brands from the US, UK and New Zealand have launched similar products.
